pages.text: The Tectonic Bite imbues the Maw with a voracious appetite for the earth itself, allowing it to excavate vast swathes of terrain in a single bite.
As the beast reaches higher Stages, its jaws distend further, capable of swallowing even greater areas. The precise reach of this hunger can be tempered within the Configuration Menu.
Instability (Heaviness): Great hunger brings great weight. When the Maw is set to devour large areas, the sheer mass of the earth renders its movement sluggish, noticeably reducing digging speed.
